Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.cluster.events

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IEventListener<T extends Event>
    Instances of this interface are listeners of events in the HA sub-system.
    IEventSource<T extends Event>
    Instances of this interface are sources of events in the HA sub-system.
    IGroupEventSource
    Instances of this interface are sources of group events in the HA sub-system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DistributedCollectionCreatedEvent
    Instances of this class are published when a new distributed collection is created.
    DistributedCollectionDeletedEvent
    Instances of this class are published when a distributed collection is deleted.
    DistributedCollectionEvent
    Superclass of all types of events that relate to a distributed collection.
    DistributedCollectionLostSynchronizationEvent
    Instances of this class are published when a distributed collection reports that it has lost synchronization.
    DistributedCollectionRegistryLostSynchronizationEvent
    Instances of this class are published when the distributed collection registry reports that it has lost synchronization.
    Event
    Base abstract superclass of all types of events used by the HA sub-system.
    GroupEvent
    Base abstract superclass of all events used by the HA sub-system that are related to the cluster's communication group.
    GroupMemberChangedRoleEvent
    Instances of this class are published when a member of the cluster's communication group changes its role.
    GroupMemberDetectedEvent
    Instances of this class are published when a new member joins the cluster's communication group.
    GroupMemberLeftEvent
    Instances of this class are published when a member leaves the cluster's communication group.
    GroupMembershipEvent
    Base abstract superclass of all events used by the HA sub-system that are related to membership changes in the cluster's communication group.
    InstructedToBecomePrimaryEvent
    Instances of this class are processed by the HA role determination state machine when this cluster node is instructed to become primary.
    InstructedToStopEvent
    Instances of this class are processed by the role determination state machine and the synchronization controller when instructed to stop.
    InstructedToSynchronizeEvent
    Instances of this class are processed by the synchronization controller when the role determination state machine forces a synchronization to happen.
    RoleConflictReportedEvent
    Instances of this class are processed by the HA role determination state machine when this cluster node is notified by another cluster node that it is involved in a role conflict.
    TimerExpiredEvent
    Instances of this class are processed by the HA role determination state machine when a timer expires.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EventType
    Enumeration of all possible types of events used by the HA sub-system.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    UnexpectedEventError
    Thrown to indicate that an unexpected event was received.
